Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Goettingen, Park Inn by Radisson Göttingen is close to St John's Church and Ganseliesel. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Georg-August University of Goettingen and Hainberg Observatorium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 114 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include desks and complimentary newspapers, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Be sure to enjoy recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features include complimentary wireless Internet access, gift shops/newsstands, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Breakfast is available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

In the heart of Goettingen, Park Inn by Radisson Göttingen is close to St John's Church and Ganseliesel. This 4-star hotel is within the vicinity of Georg-August University of Goettingen and Hainberg Observatorium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St John's Church - 2.2 km / 1.3 mi
Ganseliesel - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Georg-August University of Goettingen - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Hainberg Observatorium - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Heritage Museum - 20.4 km / 12.7 mi
Northeim Town Hall - 20.5 km / 12.7 mi
Theater of Night - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi
Forest Stage Northeim - 20.9 km / 13 mi
Welfenschloss - 21.4 km / 13.3 mi
Tanzwerder Island - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi
St. Blasius Church - 21.6 km / 13.4 mi
Uslar Waterpark - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi
Alaris Butterfly Park - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi
Solling Tower - 27.3 km / 16.9 mi
Eicke's House - 31.9 km / 19.8 mi

The preferred airport for Park Inn by Radisson Göttingen is Hannover (HAJ) - 104.4 km / 64.9 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Hanover (HAJ): Approximate driving time is 100 minutes and distance is 165 kilometers (102.5 miles).

Bus number 60 runs between Hanover city centre and the airport every 20 minutes. Taxis are available from outside the terminal building. A train runs to Göttingen train station and takes 40 minutes.

Driving directions : From Hanover airport, follow the A7 motorway in the direction of Kassel. Göttingen lies on the A7.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
